statements: SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE birthdate <= '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number, birthdate, loyalty_points FROM customer_profiles WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, birthdate FROM customer_profiles WHERE birthdate BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31' ORDER BY birthdate DESC, customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' AND loyalty_points < 50 ORDER BY customer_name ASC, loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email, loyalty_points FROM customer_profiles WHERE email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, birthdate, loyalty_points FROM customer_profiles WHERE birthdate < '1975-01-01' AND loyalty_points BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT reward_name, points_required, expiration_date FROM LoyaltyRewards WHERE points_required > 100;
SELECT reward_name, description FROM LoyaltyRewards ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM LoyaltyRewards WHERE points_required > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT reward_name, points_required, expiration_date FROM LoyaltyRewards WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, phone_number FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerProfiles ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM RewardsPreferences WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM RewardsPreferences WHERE preference_type = 'Interest';
SELECT reward_name, reward_points FROM LoyaltyRewards WHERE reward_points > 50 ORDER BY reward_points DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM CustomerProfiles;
SELECT * FROM RewardsPreferences WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY preference_type DESC;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points FROM LoyaltyRewards WHERE reward_points > 100 ORDER BY reward_points ASC;
SELECT customer_name, reward_name, reward_points FROM CustomerProfiles JOIN LoyaltyRewards ON CustomerProfiles.customer_id = LoyaltyRewards.customer_id WHERE reward_points > 50 ORDER BY reward_name;

SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, reward_name, reward_points FROM CustomerProfiles JOIN LoyaltyRewards ON CustomerProfiles.customer_id = LoyaltyRewards.customer_id WHERE reward_points > 50 ORDER BY customer_name ASC, reward_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerProfiles ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT preference_type, preference_value FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT reward_name, reward_points FROM LoyaltyRewards WHERE expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerProfiles ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT cp.customer_name, cr.reward_name FROM CustomerProfiles cp INNER JOIN LoyaltyRewards cr ON cp.customer_id = cr.reward_id;

SELECT cp.customer_name, rp.reward_name, rr.redemption_date FROM CustomerProfiles cp INNER JOIN RewardRedemption rr ON cp.customer_id = rr.customer_id INNER JOIN LoyaltyRewards rp ON rr.reward_id = rp.reward_id WHERE rr.redemption_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles UNION SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT prefered_category, prefered_brand FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT reward_type, reward_description, expiry_date FROM loyalty_rewards WHERE expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, points_earned, transaction_date FROM points_earned ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE last_name = 'Doe'
SELECT first_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1001
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE prefered_category = 'Electronics' AND prefered_brand = 'Samsung'
SELECT customer_id, reward_type, expiry_date FROM loyalty_rewards WHERE reward_type = 'Discount' ORDER BY expiry_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, points_earned, transaction_date FROM points_earned WHERE points_earned > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
